# TuberIA

> AI-powered YouTube video summarization platform. Subscribe to YouTube channels and receive automatic AI-generated summaries of new videos without manual intervention.

TuberIA is a full-stack web application that helps users stay up-to-date with their favorite YouTube channels by automatically generating concise summaries of new videos using AI.

## Tech Stack

- [Frontend](/frontend): React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, TanStack Query
- [Backend](/backend): Node.js 20, Express 5.1, JWT authentication, BullMQ job queues
- [Database](/docker-compose.yml): MongoDB 8, Redis 7
- [Infrastructure](/Caddyfile): Docker, Docker Compose, Caddy reverse proxy

## Project Structure

- [Frontend Source](/frontend/src): React components, pages, hooks, and services
- [Backend Source](/backend/src): Express controllers, routes, middlewares, and services
- [API Routes](/backend/src/routes): REST API endpoint definitions
- [Models](/backend/src/model): Mongoose database schemas

## Key Files

- [Backend App](/backend/src/app.js): Express application setup and middleware configuration
- [Backend Entry](/backend/src/index.js): Server entry point and bootstrap
- [Frontend App](/frontend/src/App.jsx): React application entry and routing
- [Docker Config](/docker-compose.yml): Container orchestration

## API Endpoints

- POST /api/auth/login: User authentication
- POST /api/auth/register: User registration
- GET /api/channels: List subscribed channels
- GET /api/videos: List videos with summaries
- POST /api/channels/subscribe: Subscribe to a YouTube channel

## Optional

- [Documentation](/docs): Additional project documentation
- [Deployment Guide](/DEPLOYMENT.md): Production deployment instructions
- [Security Policy](/SECURITY.md): Security vulnerability reporting guidelines
